name: Ferrous Shadow
r1: When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
r2: When HP falls below 75%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
r3: When HP falls below 80%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 40% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
r4: When HP falls below 85%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 45% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
r5: When HP falls below 90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
